item.description:
For those of you who can't make it to Friday's event, those who want to go to Friday's event and game all night long, or those who just want to come back and game some more after a good night's sleep,  We will be going all Saturday as well.  Please bring a snack or something as we are usually about out by this time.

 

Feel free to call me to see what's going on or what we might need.

 

Ben 617-997-3545
item.name: Yes, We're still gaming
